Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 132nd overall pick, by Oakland in 1969...
Drafted in 7th round, 132nd overall pick, by Oakland in 1969...
Injured on 8/6/1971 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by St. Louis in 1973...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1976, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/28/1977 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1977...
Injured on 4/23/1978 with a Broken Knee, out for full season...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (N) on 8/2/1979...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 5/16/1980...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1980...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 6/3/1981...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1981...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1982, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1982, hitting .449 with 7 HR, 23 RBI...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/28/1982 with a Fractured Ankle, out for 2-3 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1983, hitting .458 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against Cincinnati, driving in 4 runs on 4/30/1983...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1983, hitting .290 with 8 HR, 26 RBI...
Traded from St. Louis to Cleveland on 1/31/1985 (Going to STL: 1B P. O'Neill. Going to CLE: RF F. Lynn, 2B J. McKnight)...
Injured on 4/18/1985 with a Fractured Hand, out for 5-6 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1985, hitting .571 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 7/10/1985...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1987...
Had 2000th career hit on 4/15/1988, off Charlie Lea (BOS)...
Injured on 8/15/1988 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1989, hitting .462 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1989, hitting .647 with 0 HR, 5 RBI...
Injured on 8/14/1989 with a Fractured Ulna, out for 5 weeks...
